abstract: Finales of “American Gladiators” and “Nashville Star” lifted NBC to second place in the ratings on Monday, trailing behind repeats on CBS, the consistent leader for the night this summer.
snippet: Finales of “American Gladiators” and “Nashville Star” lifted NBC to second place in the ratings on Monday, trailing behind repeats on CBS, the consistent leader for the night this summer.
lead_paragraph: Finales of “American Gladiators” and “Nashville Star” lifted NBC to second place in the ratings on Monday, trailing behind repeats on CBS, the consistent leader for the night this summer. According to Nielsen’s estimates, both NBC shows matched their highest ratings of the season among adults 18 to 49. The two-hour “Gladiators” drew an average of 5.3 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., while “Nashville Star” attracted 6.3 million at 10 p.m.

headline.main: CBS Repeats Trump NBC Reality Shows
